text: Can `asdf` and `pyenv` live side-by-side at the same time?

elements.text: live side-by-side at the same time?

text:
Yes. I have them both on my work VM, and they work fine side-by-side.
That said, I only use `pyenv` for Python versioning and `asdf` for Julia versioning to keep them from stepping on each other's toes. I don't know what would happen if I started to do Python versioning with `asdf` too.

text: That might break something, so I just don't do it. At some point I'll probably build a new VM with a more recent Ubuntu version. At that point I'll probably switch my versioning to `asdf` only (as I already have it on my personal computer).
